name: Mining Hell
description:
A simple 6DoF game inspired by Descent and Asteroids. Made in a week for the Brackey's game Jam 2021! Big shout out to HiRez Spaceships and 8bit Music on Unity Asset Store for adding the finishing touches to this project.

Controls:

Esc to Pause

W for forward pitch

S for backward pitch

A for left yaw

D for right yaw

Q for left rotation

E for right rotation

Space for forward thruster

F for backward thruster

Note: you and your ship and controlled by space physics. Small gravities will effect your movement as will momentum.
